plugins.name: Media embed
plugins.description: Allows for inserting embeddable media such as YouTube or Vimeo videos, Instagram posts and tweets or Google Maps into your rich-text content.

htmlOutput._comment: If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned off, the media preview is not displayed and the media is represented using only the `<oembed>` tag (by default).
If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned on, the media preview is displayed in the view.
If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned off, the plugin can be configured to return any element name specified by `config.mediaEmbed.elementName`.
If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned on, the media preview is displayed in the view.
If `config.mediaEmbed.previewsInData` is turned on, the media preview is displayed in the view.
The plugin can be configured to return any element with any class, inline style, and attribute, via `config.mediaEmbed.providers` for previewable media.

plugins.name: Media embed toolbar
plugins.description: Implements an optional toolbar for media embed that shows when the media element is selected.
